    • Event

      public Event​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, int durationMin, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String picture)
      Constructor of Event
      Parameters:
      title - title of the event
      description - description of the event
      durationMin - duration (in minutes) of the event
      author - author of the event
      director - director of the event
      picture - picture of the event

  • Method Details

    • addPerformance

      public boolean addPerformance​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Add a performance of the event
      Parameters:
      date - date of the new performance
      Returns:
      true if prices are set so performance can be added; false if not

    • removePerformance

      public void removePerformance​(Performance performance)
      Removes a performance of the event
      Parameters:
      performance - performance to be removed

    • getPerformances

      public java.util.List<Performance> getPerformances​(boolean happened)
      Returns the performance
      Parameters:
      happened - boolean to decide whether to show performances that already happened or not
      Returns:
      List of performances containing the performances of the event happened or not depending on the parameter

    • getPerformances

      public java.util.List<Performance> getPerformances()
      Gets the list of performances
      Returns:
      list (unmodifiable) with the performance

    • getATR

      by - type of search
      Returns:

    • getTitle

    • setRestriction

      public boolean setRestriction​(double restriction)
      Sets restrictions for an event
      Parameters:
      restriction - restriction to set
      Returns:
      true if the restriction was set correctly; false if not

    • getRestriction

      public double getRestriction()
      Getter of restriction
      Returns:

    • setPrices

      public void setPrices​(java.util.Map<SimpleArea,​java.lang.Double> prices)
      Set the prices for the performance
      Parameters:
      prices - a map of prices with all of the simple areas assignd to a price

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice​(SimpleArea area)
      Get the price in an area
      Parameters:
      area - area to get the price from
      Returns:
      -1 if there is no price assigned. The price otherwise

    • checkPrices

      public boolean checkPrices()
      checks if all the areas have a price assignated for the event
      Returns:
      true iff all areas have a price assignated

    • addPrice

      public boolean addPrice​(SimpleArea a, double price)
      adds a price to an area
      Parameters:
      a - area to add a price to
      price - price to be added to the area
      Returns:
      true iff it was added correctly
